summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the payment of, the cost and expense of the condemnation of 30th Avenue Northeast, from Blakely Street to East 55th Street; of East 53rd Street, between 29th Avenue Northeast and 30th Avenue Northeast, and of the alley between East 53rd Street and East 54th Street, from 30th Avenue Northeast, as provided for in Ordinance No. 46794, as provided for in Ordinance No. 46794, of said City; and repealing Ordinance No. 50352.
